rooms.name: The Copywriting Studio
rooms.story: You're in a bright studio. A prompt appears: 'CREATE MAGNETIC LANDING PAGE COPY.' Your goal: write a prompt that makes Claude generate irresistible marketing copy.
rooms.task: Write a prompt to generate a landing page headline and tagline for a coffee shop that emphasizes quality and community
hints: What makes this coffee shop special?
rooms.perfectExample: Create an engaging, creative landing page headline and tagline for a specialty coffee shop called 'Brew Haven'. The brand emphasizes artisanal quality, local sourcing, and community gathering. Make it feel premium but welcoming. Target coffee enthusiasts aged 25-45.

rooms.name: The Content Factory
rooms.story: You're in a factory that generates endless content. Your challenge: write ONE prompt that generates THREE compelling product descriptions with consistent voice.
rooms.task: Write a prompt to generate 3 unique product descriptions for an e-commerce bookstore
hints: Show an example of the tone you want
Give variety guidance (don't make them all the same)
rooms.perfectExample: Generate 3 unique product descriptions for vintage science fiction books. Each should be 2-3 sentences, highlight why readers love them, and include an emotional hook. Example tone: 'Escape into futures that shaped our world. These aren't just stories—they're portals.' Make each description different in style but consistent in brand voice.

rooms.name: The Email Vault
rooms.story: Email campaigns await. Your mission: write a SCOPE-based prompt for marketing copy that converts.
rooms.task: Write a SCOPE-based prompt for an email campaign targeting remote teams
hints: What role should AI play? (Copywriter, strategist, etc.)
What exact output do you want?
Show an example of good copy
rooms.perfectExample:
S - Expert SaaS email copywriter
C - Project management tool for remote teams, launching next month
O - Subject line + 3-paragraph email
P - Max 150 words, focus on time wasted in Slack vs. productivity
E - 'Stop ping-ponging. Start shipping.' (punchy, action-focused)

Generate an email that makes team leads want to try us.

rooms.name: The Social Media Studio
rooms.story: Social platforms await your content. Your challenge: write a prompt that generates Instagram captions with personality and punch.
rooms.task: Write a prompt for Instagram captions that feel authentic and conversational
hints: Show the brand personality (sarcastic? warm? bold?)
Make it feel human, not AI
rooms.perfectExample: Write 5 Instagram captions for a coffee brand. Make them feel like they're from a friend, not a company. Use 1-2 emojis per caption, keep them short (2-3 sentences max). Example: 'Plot twist: your Tuesday just got better ☕✨ New single-origin drop is live.' Tone should be witty, relatable, never salesy.

rooms.name: The Iteration Chamber
rooms.story: You've got 80% there. Now it's time to master refinement: rewriting prompts to get the final 20% that makes outputs SHIP-READY.
rooms.task: Write a follow-up prompt that refines and improves previous AI output
hints: What exact change do you want?
rooms.perfectExample: That's close! But make it edgier and less corporate. Add 1-2 emojis per line. Cut the length by 40%. Sound like you're texting a friend, not writing for marketing. Remove all buzzwords like 'innovative' and 'cutting-edge'.
